newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: One,six mth Saudi t-bill rates flat, three mth up.
newsitem.headline: One,six mth Saudi t-bill rates flat, three mth up.

text.p: Yields on one and six month Saudi treasury bills were flat and those on three month bills were higher at this week's Saudi Arabian Monetary Agency offering worth three billion riyals, bankers said on Monday.

The yield on 28-day bills was steady at 5.2952 percent while the rate on 91-day paper climbed to 5.4201 from 5.3612. The rate on 182-day bills was 5.5444 percent -- the same as that on last week's 190-day bills.
One month interbank rates were steady at 5-7/16, 5/16 percent, three months were 5-9/16, 7/16 percent and six months were 5-11/16, 9/16 percent.
